actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend title V of the Motor Vehicle Information and Cost Savings Act.

summary.text: Amends the Motor Vehicle Information and Cost Savings Act to specify when the failure of a manufacturer of motor vehicles to comply with any average fuel economy standard constitutes unlawful conduct. Sets forth the formula for deducting specified credits from the amount of any civil penalty assessed against a manufacturer.

titles.title: A bill to amend title V of the Motor Vehicle Information and Cost Savings Act.
